ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] chat channel
ygData.messageBody:
Salutations Christina and All!

<< You can create serverwide channels I believe. To do
it you do something like:
/join serverwide.women
So everyone could in theory join that channel and
chat, even being on different servers. >>

Cool. Do you know how you would then talk on that
channel vs. others or distinguish from ingame play.

for example I can type /g to talk to my guild. Would
you have to type the above every time you wanted to
may any statement? Would there be a check to see who
was on the serverwide.women? Just curious. If there is
I could open this up when I got on, check for anyone
else who had done the same than say hi . . .

:o)
Brangvyne Nimloth <Hand of Judgement>
lvl 33 Wood Elf Ranger - Xegony Server.
